title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 454.1 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 454.1 - Scope

State Regulations

The provisions of this Part, along with the provisions of

Part 452 of this Title, apply to safe home networks and safe homes for victims
of domestic violence, and are separate from Parts 453 and 455 of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
454.1

Adopted

New

York State Register April 1, 2020/Volume XLII, Issue 13, eff. 4/1/2020

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
